title: Leeds United Live: Ipswich Town 2-1 Leeds United - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united face ipswich town in the championship .
scott wootton , lewis cook and alex mowatt return for leeds .
doukara scores inside 13 seconds to give leeds the lead .
chambers equalises shortly after half time .
pitman heads home in extra time to end leeds ' unbeaten eight match run .

documents.title: good eveningipswich 2-1 leeds
text: that 's an end to leeds united 's unbeaten eight match run - and their play-off hopes have taken a serious battering tonight .
they had the lead after 13 seconds but lost it in extra time , after a defensive error left brett pitman unmarked .
you can listen to our post-match interview with a distinctly unimpressed steve evans here .
we 'll be back on saturday for another important game against sheffield wednesday .
until then , thank you for joining us and have a great evening .

documents.title: more from evansipswich 2-1 leeds
text: `` when you try sand become good players with little flicks , and you 're not looking to win , that 's not the way to play football and win matches , '' steve evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` we had individuals who decided they wanted to attack , rather than get possession .
leeds united supporters will be thinking we need to get some better players .
`` the whole thing was wrong after twenty minutes .
marco 's distribution was all over the place , we were never high enough up the pitch and everything was a problem .
`` we need to get some quality into this football club .
we are trying to sign them but it 's frustrating . ''

documents.title: evans on tonight 's lossipswich 2-1 leeds
text: steve evans has been speaking to bbc radio leeds about tonight 's loss .
`` i do n't think ipswich deserved the point , i think they were as bad as we were , '' evans told adam pope .
`` second half , ipswich had a lot of play but i do n't seem to remember too many chances .
if you switch off , you get punished .
`` the second goal was a shambles .
in ten seconds it 's crossed in , bellusci has to come out because scott ( dallas ) has missed it and pitman heads it in . ''

documents.title: what does that do to the table ? ipswich 2-1 leeds
text: so tonight 's loss sees leeds slip to 15th place , with 12 points separating them and sixth-placed brighton .
huddersfield 's win sees them move up to 16th , trailing leeds by just one point .

documents.title: noel on the season so faripswich 2-1 leeds
text: you ca n't go into games looking to just get through it .
you have to put pressure on their keeper , look to score goals and we did n't do that in the second half .

nobody wants to settle for a point but when you 're not having much possession and yove been under pressure for so long , sometimes you have to say if you come out with a point , that is a good point .
mick mccarthy sides are battling and honest .
we were outmuscled .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: more from noelipswich 2-1 leeds
text: they all worked really hard , that 's the sickening bit
i just felt that every second ball , pretty much , went to ipswich .
it was like they had a homing device and that kept the pressure on leeds .
when you think about it , leeds did n't have that many chances and when you come to these grounds , where you know you 'll be under the cosh , that will be the difference .

documents.title: noel on the resultipswich 2-1 leeds
text: it is gutting .
they worked so hard to get to 90 minutes and a point would have been really good to take from here .
when it gets to certain points you have to be switched on and concentrated and leeds just were n't when it mattered .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : ipswich 2-1 leeds
text: brett pitman has ended leeds united 's run of eight unbeaten games with a pinpoint header in extra time .
who would have thought , after leeds took the lead after 12 seconds , that leeds would lose it in extra time ?
we 'll have reaction from steve evans very shortly - let us know your thoughts by tweeting us @ twitterid

documents.title: ipswich 2-1 leeds
text: ipswich can waste as much time as they want .
they 're about to continue their excellent run of tuesday night games .

documents.title: breakinggoal pitman : ipswich 2-1 leeds
text: that 's pretty much the end of leeds ' unbeaten eight match run , as brett pitman heads home .
leeds just lost concentration .
pitman was unmarked in the middle of the box and he had all the time in the world to head home .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: stuart dallas makes a run and does well to close down christophe berra and end another ipswich attack .
we 've got five minutes of added time ahead of us .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: ipswich work the ball again into a good position , but ryan chambers fires his shot over the bar .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: i honestly do n't know how that 's not gone in .
marco silvestri comes rushing forward to collect the ball in his arms and misses it .
freddie sears came darting in and around the keeper , but his cross flew just in front of brett pittman and out of play .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: there 's another change for ipswich as luke hyam comes on for kevin bru .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: kalvin phillips is shown a yellow for an overenthusiastic tackle on kevin bru .
that looked high as well - phillips has been lucky not to see a red .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: mirco antenucci finds himself off-side almost straight away after coming on .
leeds have struggled with that tonight , with stuart dallas and soulemayne doukara also flagged for it .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: leeds also make their final substitution of the game , as mirco antenucci and his beard come on for lewis cook .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: ipswich make a change , as daryl murphy is replaced by brett pitman .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: ryan fraser finds daryl murphy again , who starts a run on goal and it 's excellent from lewis cook to tackle him and take the ball away .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: ryan fraser chips the ball in to daryl murphy , who has a free header towards goal virtually .
he chips it upwards rather than straight , however , and marco silvestri takes it easily .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: so close for ipswich as the ball flies wide at the back post .
kevin bru bent the ball in and it had some lovely in-swing .
it might have took a deflection but it has somehow gone wide .
leeds were lucky there .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: giuseppe bellusci does well to slide the ball through to soulemayne doukara , but doukara slides into two defenders and dean gerken collects the ball .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: there 's a brief break in play as ryan fraser has an injury seen to , before lewis cook and liam bridcutt work the ball through to soulemayne doukara though .
the ball gets within touching distance of sam byram , however , and ipswich swamp it and clear .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: stuart dallas runs up the pitch but the ipswich defence does well to knock it out for a goalkick .
a good run from dallas but ipswich are more than equal to it .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: another minute , another chance for ipswich , who have smelt blood .
ryan fraser crosses in again and marco silvestri does well to catch the deflection .
leeds make another change , as mustapha carayol makes way for stuart dallas .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: liam bridcutt is caught in possession and daryl murphy works his way through , but charlie taylor clears .
it 's starting to get slippy out there , which a few leeds players demonstrate as they trip trying to get up the pitch .
ipswich are really targeting leeds down the right .

text: close for ipswich as giuseppe bellusci does n't clear his lines and ipswich are able to fire the ball into the area .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: there 's a change for leeds as kalvin phillips replaces alex mowatt .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: jonathan douglas up the first yellow of the game .
not for his beard , as noel suggests , but for a tackle on mustapha carayol .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: liam bridcutt is doing his best to keep ipswich out of the game but they are so strong from their set pieces .
they 're dominating possession at the moment as jonas knudsen sends another cross on to goal .
it deflects out to cole skuse , who has a shot from 30 yards that clatters into the goalpost .

documents.title: ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: liam bridcutt loses possession in his own half but does well to win the ball back almost instantly .
ryan fraser then works his way down the left again and crosses in , but marco silvestri claims it this time .

documents.title: breakinggoal chambers : ipswich 1-1 leeds
text: ah .
ipswich deserve that , in fairness , after the way they came back from that early goal .
not the best defending you 'll see from leeds as ryan fraser came speeding down the left and crossed in to luke chambers .
chambers was hovering close to the net and headed it past an outstretched marco silvestri to equalise .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: there 's a burst from lewis cook as he races into ipswich 's half and passes through to mustapha carayol .
carayol 's cross is strong and finds alex mowatt at the edge of the box , but mowatt ca n't keep the shot down .
better from leeds though .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: freddie sears is at it again as he crosses into the penalty area , but marco silvestri is forward to collect it .
he then sends a lovely ball in to sam byram as leeds worm their way up the pitch .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: there 's no changes for either side but it 's ipswich who have the first shot of the half as freddie sears fires it over the bar .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: both sides are back out at portman road - can leeds register their first victory at ipswich since 2013 ?

documents.title: donny twins join leeds unitedipswich 0-1 leeds
text: leeds have bolstered their youth groups with the signing of doncaster rovers twins paul and jack mckay .
the 19-year-olds , originally from glasgow , will initially play for the under-21s after signing two-and-a-half year deals .
striker jack has made four appearances for rovers , while his defender brother paul made his debut in the johnstone 's paint trophy .
`` it 's a massive club .
as soon as i heard leeds wanted to bring us here , i said 'yes ' straight away , '' jack told the club website .

documents.title: varney returnsipswich 0-1 leeds
text: leeds have n't beaten ipswich at portman road since august 2013 - and their goalscorer on the night now plays for the opposition .
luke varney and ross mccormack scored for the whites as they overcame ipswich to win 2-1 .
varney extended his deal with ipswich until the end of the season in december , but injury has meant he has made just five appearances for the tractor boys .

documents.title: noel on the first halfipswich 0-1 leeds
text: we have the added benefit of a great shot stopper .
we know nine times out of ten silvestri will make that save and that 's what he has done .
we had the bonus of starting off sharply and getting that goal .
it gave them something to work for and something to encourage people to chase down .
we are doing to ipswich what teams do to us at elland road .
now it 's about can we really hurt them in this second half ?
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time : ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: soulemayne doukara gave leeds a fantastic head start with a lovely goal inside 13 seconds , but it 's not been plain sailing for the whites .
ipswich have pegged leeds back on several occasions , and marco silvestri has been forced into some fantastic saves .
leeds have held their own though - a talking to from steve evans should encourage them to sharpen up their game in the second half .
it was n't all bad for ipswich town after conceding within the first minute .
their social media guy has potentially sent the tweet of the night .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: leeds manage to clear the corner but it 's a bit of a scramble .
they are looking forward to half-time , which will come after two minutes of added time .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: a fantastic high save from marco silvestri denies ryan fraser .
ooh , that was close ; he shifted it onto his right foot and tried to slam it into the top corner .
silvestri did really well to palm it away , but that 's a corner .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: marco silvestri seems to be okay to carry on , and leeds respond by struggling to clear an ipswich attack .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: there 's a brief break in play as marco silvestri calls for some attention - it looks like he 's struggling with his calf .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: soulemayne doukara is doing his best up front and trying to keep both of ipswich 's centre-halves under control .
he 's done well so far .
ipswich work their way down the left and jonas knudsen swings a cross in , but charlie taylor again does well to clear with a header .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: there 's some good defence from leeds - courtesy of lewis cook - and then some not-so-great stuff as they just lose the ball on the second touch .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: ipswich have penned leeds back after that extraordinary opening minute .
kevin bru 's volley flies wide and there 's a huge shout from the ipswich fans for a penalty on luke chambers .
it 's waved on by the ref , however .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: kevin bru swings the ball in to ryan fraser , and liam cooper does well with a header to keep it away .
lewis cook is a little sloppy in trying to clear the ball , but there 's a scramble and the ball is knocked out .

text: leeds ' second ball has been a little poor tonight ; they 're winning it and then giving it away far too easily .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds

it was far too easy for him to work his way into space , and marco silvestri fumbled but was able to cling on to it .

text: liam bridcutt 's through ball is stolen by ipswich and freddie sears tries to work the ball towards ryan fraser .
liam cooper does well to knock it away , and ipswich are forced to defend .

ipswich fight back with a long-range shot from kevin bru .
it 's going wide but it is very well held by marco silvestri .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: ipswich are n't going to give up , however , as daryl murphy forces marco silvestri into a save .
murphy found himself in space and ran - leeds defence was too slow there - but silvestri reacted quickly to knock it wide .

documents.title: ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: right , well , that was unexpected .
portman road is absolutely silent , apart from the chants of the leeds fans .

documents.title: breakinggoal doukara : ipswich 0-1 leeds
text: well that 's one way to wake everyone up from the cold - soulemayne doukara has scored within 13 seconds !
that 's the very definition of a positive start , as jonathan douglas takes a heavy touch and doukara grabs it and runs with it .
he 's slotted it into the net with a lovely , low strike - and that 's 1-0 leeds inside 13 seconds .

documents.title: ipswich 0-0 leeds
text: we 're underway at portman road , with leeds going right to left .
town have won 12 tuesday games on the bounce - can leeds break that run ?

documents.title: one minute to goipswich v leeds
text: there 's been a nice sing-a-long to david bowie just before kick off down at portman road , which was both touching and tuneless .
the teams are out on the pitch - it is not warm out there by any means !

documents.title: last time outipswich v leeds
text: ipswich came out on top when the two sides previously met at elland road back in november .
tommy smith 's first-half header sealed a 1-0 victory and condemned uwe rosler 's men to their first league defeat of the season .
it was the first time leeds had lost at home to ipswich since 2005 - and they 'll be looking to avenge that defeat tonight .

documents.title: noel on doukaraipswich v leeds
text: it 's a disciplined role .
we do n't need the doukara that will be out on the wings .
we need the doukara that will be in the box .
last time it did n't really work against mk dons .
he spent far too much time out wide and nobody took up his position in the box .
we need a disciplined performance .
we have people on the wings now with loads of energy so its important doukara is there to take up those crosses coming in .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: eye on the oppositionipswich v leeds
text: ipswich currently occupy the final play-off position in sixth , with nine points separating them and leeds .
they have lost three of their 12 home games this season , and their record against leeds is impressive .
town have won six of their last eight home matches against the whites , with leeds unable to keep a clean sheet in the last six games .

leeds ca n't afford to leave portman road with anything less than a draw - but with the memory of a 4-1 drubbing last time these two met in ipswich , it will be an uphill struggle for steve evans ' men .

documents.title: `` i was getting a battering on twitter ! `` ipswich v leeds
text: new signing mustapha carayol made a serious statement on his debut at leeds united , with a stunning goal against rotherham on saturday .
`` i 'm pleased that i 've pleased some of the fans , '' carayol told adam pope after the game .
`` i was getting a bit of a battering on twitter !
`` i like to be positive and try and create things for the strikers .
i had a really long injury so i 'm still trying to get to grips with the game and playing 90 minutes .
`` every game from now to the end of the season will be tough .
we 've really got to go out positive and try and win every game to be in with a shot at the top six . ''

documents.title: evans on more signingsipswich v leeds
text: steve evans still has one eye on the transfer window following the signing of twins jack and paul mckay .

`` in the next week or two we are going to add two or three more signings , and hopefully they will prove it on the pitch , rather than what they 've done anywhere else , '' evans told bbc radio leeds .
`` we are about building at leeds united .
if people want to be a part of us then we will do our best to make them a part of it .
`` all our young players are embracing being here .
they love being at leeds united and they are playing some super football .
`` that has been demonstrated by the offers we 've received from other clubs , but everyone is still with us at the minute . ''

documents.title: popey on tonight 's gameipswich v leeds
text: it 's a tough one for leeds tonight at ipswich - town have won 14 tuesday home matches on the bounce !
chris wood will hopefully be fit for saturday 's game against sheffield wednesday .
it 's a lot of responsibility for doukara .
i was all for him going on his own against mk dons but it did n't work well .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: steve evans ' guide to managementipswich v leeds
text: steve evans has been speaking to bbc radio leeds about what it takes to manage a championship side .
`` you have to man-manage more these days than any manager had to in the past , '' evans told adam pope .
`` today 's young men need talking to and they need a plan for being in the first team .
`` they need to be shown loyalty when they do well in the first team , and i 've demonstrated that .
the players have to believe that the head coach the team with real honesty and integrity . ''

documents.title: breakingteam newsipswich v leeds
text: there are three changes to steve evans ' side tonight , with chris wood still missing with a hamstring injury .
alex mowatt , lewis cook and scott wootton all start for leeds , with soulemayne doukara going solo up front .
tom adeyemi and mirco antenucci are both on the bench .
leeds united xi : silvestri , wootton , bellusci , cooper , taylor , byram , bridcutt , mowatt , cook , carayol , doukara .
ipswich town xi : gerken , chambers , smith , berra , knudsen , skuse , douglas , fraser , bru , sears , murphy .

text: news : # lufc trip to @ twitterid will now take place on tuesday jan 26 ( 7.45pm ) due to united being involved in # facup the following w/end .

documents.title: it 's a big week for leedsipswich v leeds
text: good evening , and welcome to tonight 's live text commentary of ipswich town v leeds united .
leeds are in the midst of their best run for some time , after saturday 's fa cup victory over rotherham made it eight games unbeaten .
they face a huge test tonight against play-off rivals ipswich town .
keep an eye on us here while you enjoy our coverage on 92.4 fm and freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can make it nine unbeaten , and close down the points gap at the top of the table .
